nodes.text: The Wideview Binocular Dome Head was a model of droid head manufactured by AccuTronics at the time of the Galactic Civil War.

The Wideview Binocular Dome Head was one of the basic droid parts that appeared in the 1998 video game Star Wars: DroidWorks. Although the name of the company is spelled "AccuTronics," with a capital T, the game used the spelling "Accutronics."
